extendedInfo.description: This application allows you to see the true cost of college beyond the mere cost of tuition.  It takes into account Financial Aid & Grants, Student Loans, Housing, Books, Transportation, and more.  Great budgeting tool in helping you plan your future.The paid version of this application allows you to save the calculations in easily portable file which can be emailed, or accessed with any of the free file managers on the android market such as Astro, IO File manager, etc.For any comments, questions or support please email:ochimobi@gmail.com

reviews.comment: Its pretty much a calculator just adds all the stuff together. Which you can do with a calculator!!! But the app works fine
reviews.author: A Google User
